runs.comm: on the middle and swinging in, pushed away to the leg side
short, wide and a very good shot to get off the mark, cut away through the covers
swinging back into the batsman, and he gets forward and defends it, the inside edge rolls over to mid-wicket for a single
on his pads and he is on the back foot, flicks it away really well to backward square-leg, beats the short fine-leg fielder but a good job by Dwayne Smith
goes down the track and smacks it to deep square-leg for a four! they have to attack from the start and that is exactly what they are doing, picks it cleanly and gone!
and this is even better, he has come down the track yet again, only this time he connects better and sends it over deep square-leg for a six! the carnage continues from the previous innings!
outside the off, length ball and he wants to punch it through the covers, gets an inside edge through to fine-leg for a four
goes down the pitch this time but does not connect properly, goes to mid-on
short of length on the middle stump, he wants to work it through the leg side but hits the thigh pad
short of length and outside the off stump, he goes for a pull but the timing eludes it again and it goes to wide mid-on for a single
length ball and angling down on his pads, he was shuffling across and it hits his pads, there is a loud shout for lbw and given not-out, it was clearly going down the leg side
smashin'! that was absolutely ripped down the ground for a four, almost taking Tamim along with him, it was fuller and the batsman takes it as a full toss and crashes it to long-on for a boundary
straighter one and swinging away from the batsman, bit of bounce and beats the outside edge
poor ball down the leg side, Tamim easily picks it up and helps it to fine-leg for another four
and dispatched over mid-on for another four, smacking start this as he goes down the track to one that is shorter and despite the lack of timing he is able to get it over mid-on for a four!
makes room and four through the covers, this is Tamim at his best! he was going away to the leg-side and the ball was on leg stump but too short, smashes it in the gap on the off side
over-compensates this time, he has been bowling short all this while and it is pitched so full up that Tamim is able to take it on the full but does not time or place it well, goes to deep cover
full-toss and that has been blitzed through fine-leg for another four, whoa, that is some cracker of a start from the hosts, 43 in three!
slower on the leg stump and punched to the leg side, they take one and the batsman wanted the second Anamul does not go back and Tamim's not happy with that
slower and shorter outside the off and he wants to play it through the off side, misses the outside edge
on the middle and this is much fuller, Anamul goes over to the off side and tries to whip it over the leg side, does well but to the fielder and that is restricted to one
quicker and fuller, taken as a full-toss and hit to deep square-leg for a single
shorter from Samuels but very quick, he wants to pull it away but hits the pads
very short and some turn for the bowler, spins back in and he is only able to play it to long-on fielder for a single
short of length and at pace, he was moving back and trying to slog it away, is beaten completely there

another shorter one and easily caught! he was living by the sword and chose to die by it as well, it was in fact on the good length and he went for a slog by moving away, came on quicker on to the bat and gets the top-edge, caught easily at mid-off
fuller but wider outside the off, driven straight to mid-off
short of length and pacy from Roach, he wanted to go for the pull, it was that kind of length but mistimes the shot
and now he pushes one fuller, well hit by the batsman, driven to extra-cover but Russell runs over from mid-off and stops it
another that is bowled in the batsman's half but the drive goes straight to wide mid-off
edged and dropped by another keeper? that was outside the off and he went for the drive, gets a big edge and it is put down by the keeper! it is catching on!
slower on the middle, pushed to the leg side for a single, bit of an inside edge
goes after him and gone for a six! that was fuller on the middle and spinning into the batsman, hits it over deep square-leg for a six!
very full on the off stump and he tries to drill it through, misses the bat and the off stump
slower from Marlon and not so full, he has to check his shot, hits back to the bowler
pitched up to the batsman and he goes for the slog, almost goes as far as the fielder, on the bounce and restricted to one
short of length and turning away from the batsman, defended to the leg side, for a single
fuller and on the middle, opens the face of the bat and hits it to point
short of length and cut away to the deep cover fielder, just a single this time
short of length and he wants to pull it away, hits it away to deep square-leg for a single
very short from the bowler and he pulls it away, that is poor running there...Tamim stopped after hitting it thinking it was going to the fence and in the end gets only one
on his pads and he tries to work it away to the leg side, hits his pads
goes down the track and drills it through the covers for a four, well-timed and very well-placed
holds his back, he was going the track and the ball almost did not arrive, he had to fend at it
fuller and into the middle-stump, had to dig it out, bowled really quick
fuller on the middle, again very rapid and works it to the leg side for a single
quick full-toss and fails to hit it over the top, gets only a single to deep square
fuller and driven down to long-on for a single
wants to pull it away, does not get it off the meat of the bat and to short fine-leg
quicker on his pads after seeing he was coming down the track, has to pad it away
shorter in length and he wants to pull it away, gets it away to the leg side for a single
shorter from the bowler and he wants to cut it away, gets it to the short point fielder
on the off stump and quicker, he pats it to short cover for a single
very full, very quick and very wide, down the leg-side and a run added to the total
short of length and pulled away but only to the deep mid-wicket region for a single
fuller outside the off stump, and not too quick either, driven to the deep cover fielder for a single
fuller on the middle and that has been deposited into the crowd, a boundary after long and a pressure-reliever as well!
goes for the same kind of stroke, but this is not as full, hits his pad and rolls over to the off side
short, wide and cracked away through the covers for a four, the fielder had to run 10 yards to his left and he made only five!
full-toss, slipped out of his hands because of the dew, pulled away to the deep square-leg for a single
short of length and pulls it but to the deep square-leg fielder, for a single
full on his pads and that is flicked away to fine-leg for a single
very slow and floated up, he was going down the track but fails to time it as well as he would have wanted to, gets it to deep cover for a single...an overthrow gets him another one
full-toss on the off stump and the top hand comes off the bat for Tamim, drilled to the point fielder
fuller on the off stump, driven to long-off for a single
that is very full as well, on the off stump and he cannot free his arms, hits it back to the bowler
full-toss and he tries to hit it hard but gets it only away to the deep square-leg fielder for a single
drifts it down the pads of the batsman, trying to bowl wicket to wicket and it is flicked away to the leg side for a single
full-toss on the middle-stump, taps it down the ground for a single
surprise bouncer from Smith and he lets it go through to the keeper this time
fuller on the off and Mahmudullah has punched it through the covers for a four, it was just a jab and races away
and now straight down, fielded well but hit hard, it was full on the off and he hits it down the ground, and again, that is poor running, just one there!
full-toss on the pads and all he does is to smack it straight to fine-leg for a single, too many of them have been wasted tonight
fuller on the middle and he taps it to the leg side to bring up his 50...and off only 40 deliveries
another full-toss and another one hit straight to the fielder at deep square-leg, how are they managing this!
okay this is getting nauseatingly repetitive, full-toss, attempt to hit hard and goes to long-on for a single
wow! full-toss again, whatever's happening here, the batsman is able to spank it to fine-leg for a single
okay, here we go again, full-toss, fourth of the over and hit it as far as the fielder as deep mid-wicket
and again! full-toss, he comes down to hit it out of the ground but hits it down to deep mid-wicket for only one!
on the middle stump line, fuller and that is flicked away to long-on for a single
short of length and outside the off, he wants to pull it away, gets it high on the bat and to the long-off for a single
finally a four! it was outside the off and short of length as well, cut away to deep backward point for a four!
fuller, on the off stump and driven through the covers for a single
on the off stump, on a good length and opens the face of the bat and hit through the covers for a single
full on the middle and he wants to go inside out, gets some bat on it but it is only an inside edge that goes on to hit his pad, not for a run
finally gets it to bounce does Gayle, on the off stump and up to the batsman, hits it down the ground for a single
full-toss. smashed to mid-wicket. for a single. the saga continues.
fullish ball on the leg stump and Tamim drives it down to long-on for a single, not getting the placement here
fuller on the off stump and that is drilled through the covers, only for a single though, not the best of running between the wickets
full-toss and missed by the batsman and this time it is missed by the keeper too, get away for a bye
and another, on the leg stump, but hitting him full on the pads, fails to get any bat on it and all they manage is a leg-bye
outside the off and he tries to hit it inside out, does not time it and it goes high in the air, to extra-cover but falls short of long-off
six for Tamim, it had to happen and soon! it was on the leg stump and that has been spanked over deep square-leg for a six!
and again, two in two! he is finally turning it on, it was outside the off and he goes down the track and smacks it over the bowler's head for a six!
and gets his timing right, why isn't Narine bowling full-tosses! he has pitched it full and gives him enough room to free his arms, hit over mid-wicket for a four
fullish on the pads and very quick too, driven to the deep square position for a single
on his pads and this is neatly tucked away to the fine-leg region for a single
fullish ball on the middle, cramps him for room and he can only defend
very full again but not a full-toss, he tries to drill it away but can get it only back to the bowler
fullish ball on the leg stump and driven down the ground for a single
fuller on the off stump and he still cannot get it away, back to the bowler
goes down the track and hits it away to the deep square-leg for a single
fullish ball on the pads and that is flicked away to deep square-leg for only a single, to end Gayle's spell that costs him only 18 runs, excellent stuff
oh dear! full-toss above the waist height, almost takes the batsman with it, and called no-ball...he had bowled one last game as well.
short of length now and he has hit it across the line to the deep square-leg region for a single
fuller on the off stump and outside the off, he was clearing his legs but misses, this has to be exhausion
yorker length ball and he can only only drill it to fine-leg for a couple of runs
outside the off and fuller and Tamim has drilled it through the covers, it is a good shot but to the fielder in the deep
brilliant, yorker length and he can only tap it away to the leg side, just for a single
very full on the off stump and he can only push it to the extra-cover fielder for a single
very full and driven down the ground and for four to the left of the long-off fielder...even 12 fours will only tie the game
and that is the second one in as many balls, it was very full and on the middle, smacked over the bowler's head for another four
full-toss, that delivery that has been perfected by the West Indian spinners tonight, outside the off and it has been hit to long-on for a single
fullish on the middle and he is only able to flick it to deep square-leg for a single
yorker-length ball and that has been tapped to the leg side for a single, Tamim wants a second but is sent back by Mahmudullah
yorker length on the middle and he was trying to hit it over mid-wicket, fails to get it over and they can get only a single
fuller on the middle and that is hit back to the bowler, hits the stumps at the non-striker's end
outside the off and drilled to the off side for a single

slower bowler, shorter as well and he has been able to spank it over deep square-leg for...would you believe it...a six! it was a hoick over the boundary to get to his fifty and he does not celebrate one bit
full-toss and spanked to mid-wicket for a four, where were these strokes earlier, especially off those umpteen full-pitchers?
on a length and outside the off stump, it swings away from the bat, the batsman wants to go for a heave but misses the outside edge
fullish ball on the middle and it has been smoked over long-on for a six to end the game on a positive note but West Indies win by 18
